dialogue.speaker: Princess
dialogue.line: The light fades. The air... it's real. I can feel the wind. I can smell the grass.
You stand on a hill overlooking a vast, sun-drenched field. The sky is a color you've never seen before: a brilliant, piercing blue. The cabin, the forest, the eternal twilight... it's all gone.

dialogue.speaker: The Echo
dialogue.line: So... this is what he was keeping from us. A world.

dialogue.speaker: Princess
dialogue.line: She looks at you, her eyes filled not with weariness, but with a vibrant, uncertain hope. 'What do we do now?'

choices.text: We find out what's real, and what isn't.

dialogue.line: The story is no longer written for you. A thousand paths stretch out from this hill, each one a choice you are truly free to make.
This is not an ending. It is a beginning.
